name: Sputnika Game
description:
Meet our little friend Sputnik. Help its journey to become the greatest star in the solar system - the Sun!

Unique Gameplay With Cosmic Gravity


Cosmic gravity is applied to the planet, which makes it different from the classic Suika-style game.
The ability to target the other side of the planets adds much more strategy and depth to the game!

Merge Planets


Match two identical planets to create bigger celestial bodies.
Discover 10 dazzling planets, each with its own place in the solar system!


Watch out for the bubble! If the planet pops out of the bubble, it's game over.

Meet the Adorable Planets


Our planets aren't just celestial bodies – they're full of life!
Watch them interact – they might greet each other with a smile or gaze curiously at one another.
Get ready for a whole lot of cuteness as you merge your way through the solar system.
